Question: But **** was able to deceive Epaphroditus and kill herself nevertheless.
Hints: The high degree of inbreeding amongst the Ptolemies is also evident when one considers this person's immediate family.
This person was also given the title of "Queen of Kings" by Antonius.
This person arrived in great state, and so charmed Antony that he chose to spend the winter of 41 BC–40 BC with her in Alexandria.
